Docs.summary: An enumeration indicating how the cached bitmap of a view must be rendered when the view's bounds change.

remarks.para: The contents of the are cached in a bitmap, the values in this enumeration determine what happens to a view when the bounds of that view change. With these you can control whether the bitmap is stretched or whether the view is redrawn.
The following table shows the behavior as it works placing this {638, 475} image in a of size {280, 100}.
